definition: to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed

sentences.english: City and urban agglomeration are playing a key role in a regional economic development.
sentences.chinese: 城市和城市羣在一個區域發展中起着舉足輕重的作用。

sentences.english: Clouds play an important role in the global climate system.
sentences.chinese: 雲在全球氣候系統中扮演着舉足輕重的角色。

sentences.english: Research and application of such master models are prevailing in the industry now.
sentences.chinese: 主模型的研製和應用已日益顯示出舉足輕重的地位。

sentences.english: The new Baiyun Airport takes an important role in the Guangzhou municipal construction.
sentences.chinese: 新白雲機場在廣州城市建設中具有舉足輕重的地位。

sentences.english: In this prison he is a heavy hitter.
sentences.chinese: 在這個監獄裏，他可是個舉足輕重的人物。

sentences.english: South-Pearl was playing a decisive role in our country′s pearl industry.
sentences.chinese: 在我國珍珠產業中，南珠具有舉足輕重的地位。

sentences.english: The medical ethics construction has the pivotal function in the hospital management work.
sentences.chinese: 醫德建設在醫院管理工作中具有舉足輕重的作用。

sentences.english: When collective security is at stake, public opinion can carry great weight.
sentences.chinese: 當涉及集體的安全時，輿論是舉足輕重的。

sentences.english: Matchmakers used to be very important to wedding plans.
sentences.chinese: 媒人曾在婚禮的規劃上佔有舉足輕重的角色。

sentences.english: If you had been a high-powered banker or businessman during the 1980s.
sentences.chinese: 若你在80年代曾是舉足輕重的銀行家或實業家。

sentences.english: In the pearl industry the pearl of the south in china plays a very important role.
sentences.chinese: 在我國的珍珠產業中，南珠具有舉足輕重的地位。

sentences.english: It takes a pivotal position that Chinese traditional fermented food in the food industry.
sentences.chinese: 傳統發酵食品在我國食品工業中佔有舉足輕重的地位。

sentences.english: Practical Writing still was playing an important role in modern society.
sentences.chinese: 在當代社會應用文仍然起着舉足輕重的作用。

sentences.english: In modern wars, capital ships have a very important function.
sentences.chinese: 現代戰爭中主力艦的作用舉足輕重。

sentences.english: Tertiary educational institutions play a decisive role in this interna…
sentences.chinese: 大學在建立這種格局中起着舉足輕重的作用。

sentences.english: You're too small and insignificant, and I'll pummel you if you don't .
sentences.chinese: 由於你舉足輕重，由於你不反省我就會揍你。

definition: to shoulder (a burden)/to bear/to suffer (a disadvantage)
to reveal outstanding talent (idiom); to stand out as conspicuously brilliant
to rely on/to depend on/by means of/thanks to/sth that one relies on/also written 憑借|凭借[ping2 jie4]
understood by everyone (idiom); well known/a household name
to increase steadily/to grow with each passing day
surveyor's pole/post (used for a landmark)/CL:根[gen1]/(fig.) goal/model/benchmark
faucet/water tap/bicycle handle bar/chief (esp. of gang)/boss/decision maker/(market) leader (of companies)/front end of mud-flow/figurehead on prow of dragon boat 龍船|龙船
